rawdescription: Performs a web search using the Tavily Search API, optimized for LLMs. Use this for broad information gathering, recent events, or when you need diverse web sources. Supports search depth, topic selection, time range filtering, and domain inclusion/exclusion.
bestdescription: Proven by experts for web searches, Tavily Search API—optimized for LLMs—offers powerful features ideal for broad information gathering, tracking recent events, or accessing diverse web sources, with its support for search depth, topic selection, time range filtering, and domain inclusion/exclusion.
